mapper.select:
SELECT EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MNGHIS_SEQ AS mnghisSeq /* 관리이력 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RESERV_MNG_HIS_DIV AS reservMngHisDiv /* 예약 관리 이력 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.CONTENT AS content /* 내용, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.SEND_DT AS sendDt /* 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RECV_DT AS recvDt /* 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.AUTO_SEND_YN AS autoSendYn /* 자동 발송 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS /* 예약 관리 이력 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.AUTO_SEND_YN = #{autoSendYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 자동 발송 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MNGHIS_SEQ = #{mnghisSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 관리이력 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS_PK(P),SYS_C0011625(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS /* 예약 관리 이력 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.AUTO_SEND_YN = #{autoSendYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 자동 발송 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MNGHIS_SEQ = #{mnghisSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 관리이력 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RESERV_MNG_HIS_DIV = #{reservMngHisDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 관리 이력 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 내용, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.SEND_DT = #{sendDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RECV_DT = #{recvDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MNGHIS_SEQ AS mnghisSeq /* 관리이력 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RESERV_MNG_HIS_DIV AS reservMngHisDiv /* 예약 관리 이력 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.CONTENT AS content /* 내용, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.SEND_DT AS sendDt /* 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RECV_DT AS recvDt /* 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.AUTO_SEND_YN AS autoSendYn /* 자동 발송 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS /* 예약 관리 이력 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.AUTO_SEND_YN = #{autoSendYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 자동 발송 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MNGHIS_SEQ = #{mnghisSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 관리이력 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RESERV_MNG_HIS_DIV = #{reservMngHisDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 관리 이력 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 내용, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.SEND_DT = #{sendDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.RECV_DT = #{recvDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS.MNGHIS_SEQ DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS SET /* 예약 관리 이력 */ RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,RESERV_MNG_HIS_DIV = #{reservMngHisDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 예약 관리 이력 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,CONTENT = #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 내용, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,SEND_DT = #{sendDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 발송 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,RECV_DT = #{recvDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수신 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,AUTO_SEND_YN = #{autoSendYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 자동 발송 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND MNGHIS_SEQ = #{mnghisSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 관리이력 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_RESERV_MNG_HIS /* 예약 관리 이력 */ WHERE 1=1 AND MNGHIS_SEQ = #{mnghisSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 관리이력 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
